author: Staff Reporter
text:
The drama club of PSG College of Arts and Science will conduct a play titled “Neer Nadodigal-Water Nomads” on January 9.

It will make an in-depth portrayal of how human exploits have destroyed nature.

The play will be enacted as a musical (with minimal dialogues) and will specifically focus on the devastation that was caused as a result of the recent Chennai floods.

It is aimed at beckoning its audience to take responsibility for everything that has gone wrong in the world and to strive to bring about change.
title: Drama at PSGCAS
